backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with data models, maps for shipments, invoices, clients, payments, accounts, sessions, login history, and includes authorization, admin auth, rate limiting, and session handling logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic mapping old client account records to new ones by adding failedAttempts, isLocked, and clientCode fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs relevant to updated backend-driven authentication and admin features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files, describing their purpose in the application.
frontend/.env: Defines environment variable for the Google Maps API key.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling admin login, client portal auth, quote form submission, tracking placeholder, and overall layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Empty placeholder file for admin client detail component.
Empty placeholder file for admin client form component.
Empty placeholder file for admin client provisioning dialog.
React table component listing client accounts with search, delete actions, and selection callback support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing clients and login history with session validation and logout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Fetches and displays sorted admin login history with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Displays a readâ€‘only notice explaining role management is disabled in password-only mode.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Empty placeholder file for admin tracking panel component.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary that captures render errors and shows details with options to refresh or copy info.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen informing the user they lack permission to access the page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated card explaining bootstrap-based admin access is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Admin password login form with error handling and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button that ends the admin session and scrolls to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login button that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog holding form fields but performing no real submission.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Login/signup tabbed interface switching between client login and signup forms.
A React login card that validates email or mobile input, handles password login via a client login mutation, and displays error or loading states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: A signup form that validates fields, submits a client account creation request, shows success or error states, and resets the form on success.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Provides client session token storage using context and localStorage, with helpers to set, clear, and detect authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, validates stored tokens, and provides login/logout functions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication provider using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for client accounts, login history, client authentication, and admin-protected operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode values, base styles, and custom gold utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice in a new window using provided invoice data.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty placeholder file for shipment-related storage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates WhatsApp deep links for payment reminders and support messages with formatted text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps backend auth error messages to user-friendly text with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers, returning structured results.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a page section while accounting for a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, plugins, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architecture notes, issues, and a list of existing and requested backend features for authentication, admin actions, and login history.
